Nightstrike:
Nightstrike arrived in Aurora jet mode, he transformed to robot mode 
and using his Twin Razor Boomerang Disks attacked at Slaughter


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::FireStrike::
> FireStrike arrives at the base and transforms to his massive 15 and 
half 
> foot mode. He walks in immediatly seeing the fight.  His arm opens 
up 
> and a rifle flies into his hand. He points it at Slaughter and 
fires 15 
> shots. He also pulls out his sword with his other hand. The sword 
that 
> is bigger than alot of transformers. He points it at Slaughter and 
it 
> opens up shooting a rocket from the inside of it.
> 
> thecode@p... wrote:
> 
> > Shokaract aims and fires the mega missile from his cannon at 
Slaughter.
> > 
> >  
> > 
> > Shokaract: Ha, oops, I made a mistake firing something that 
destructive 
> > I think...
